name: Sudoku Desktop
description:
Have you ever tried playing Sudoku? But what about with 6 different difficulties? Download this game to find out!

Unlike my other games/projects, this game is available for cross-platform download, an ofc, completely free for download (If you don't know how to, just click "download" and click "No thanks, just take me to the downloads"

How to play? Just enter your name, select a difficulty, and hit "new game". There is already a built-in number board/keyboard (If you don't see it, click "Ctrl" and "+" (at the same time), press it again until you see the board/keyboard)

Additional Features: You Can pause, full screen (click F11), built-in a stopwatch, dark mode, and custom name (NOTE: the light theme and dark theme doesn't automatically changes according to your device's settings)

What are the 6 difficulties?

  • Easy
  • Medium
  • Hard
  • Very hard
  • Insane
  • Inhuman

Further instructions: To change the difficulty, click on "Easy" (click it multiple times to change to different difficulties) To change the theme, click on the moon/sun icon on the top right, to pause click on the pause icon next to the stopwatch

The font may be a little bad because it was supposed to be on HTML but I still decided to make it on PC too

This game is also available on Amazon Apps store (If you can't download Sudoku Mobile on Amazon, just download "Sudoku Mobile.apk" for Android 5+)
